title: Everlasting
lyrics:
Hood Fav
Hey!
Aye, all I know is that I gotta have it (Have it)
Smoking dope but I call it the [?]
I've been stacking, I made it a habit (Habit)

Aye, boy what happened, I thought you were savage? (Savage)

So obvious when they be acting (Acting)

Got a lot of it, I need the racks in (Racks in)

I’m a cheater, like my side bitch (Side bitch)

'Cause she fronted on me back then (Back then)

Could've put you in the diamonds (Diamonds)

You rather be with the plastic (Plastic)

And I ain’t trusting nobody (Nobody)

Unless I seen you in some action (Hey)

Keep my brothers right by me (By me)

You other niggas get to packing

I was broke nigga, I was embarrassed

Now my pockets filled up with the cabbage

Now this money everlasting

I used to put it in the mattress (Mattress)



Aye, but I'm okay if you asking (Asking)

I went and got me a bad bitch (Bad bitch)

She came with a lil baggage (Baggage)

Yeah, but it's okay 'cause I'm cashing

If I see it I want it, no splashing

But it ain't for her, she can't have shit (Hey!)

Get in the whip through the dash shit

I've been on a road for the backends

And I’m moving slow, never lacking

Diamond dancing, I got Jacksons (Hey!)

Jugging oz, then I tax em’ (Yeah)

Got a yellow bone, she a taxi

Her friend wanna bone, now she ight

Bro these bitches hoes, if you ask me

You wasn't with me on the block

Ain’t help me stack, you didn't help me grow (Grow)

See me at the top, stay where you at, leave me alone (Alone)

Straight flexing, I'm a need all of the extras

Put the hood on my back, no pressure (Hey!)

Tryna get the Maybach, no Tesla

That money, it look like it stuck to me

I came up, now they don't wanna fuck with me (Over the phone)

My niggas know that they stuck with me

Wasn’t there, then you can't get the bucks with me

I'm with the same gang, ain't shit changed, niggas [?] dubs with me

I hit a stain, now I got to maintain, niggas running it up with me

And if I run down on your main thing

Then she leaving the club with me (Leaving the club with me)

She know I'm up now, how the chain bling

Had her falling in love with me (Falling in love with me)

I'm a go cash out, on that brand new crib

Now I'm living in luxury, the Lambo is yellow like Bumblebee

I get super sized, double D's (Aye)



Aye, all I know is I gotta have it (Have it)

Smoking dope but I call it the [?]

I've been stacking, I made it a habit (Habit)

Aye, boy what happened I thought you were savage? (Savage)

So obvious when they be acting (Acting)

Got a lot of it, I need the racks in (Racks in)

I'm a cheater, like my side bitch (Side bitch)

'Cause she fronted on me back then (Back then)

Could've put you in the diamonds (Diamonds)

You rather be with the plastic (Plastic)

And I ain't trusting nobody (Nobody)

Unless I seen you in some action (Hey)

Keep my brothers right by me (By me)

You other niggas get to packing

I was broke nigga, I was embarrassed

Now my pockets filled up with the cabbage

Now this money everlasting

I used to put it in the mattress (Mattress)
